amendment.description: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert: SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE. This act may be cited as the "Sexual Assault Forensic Evidence Reporting Act of 2012" or the "SAFER Act of 2012".***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text and amend the title.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to without objection.
